title: Ticket #6770: packaging important files under /etc is problematic
description:
The HTCondor 8.7.9 Debian packages for stretch release these files under /etc

  • condor_ssh_to_job_sshd_config_template
  • interactive.sub
  • linux_kernel_tuning

It appears that condor looks for condor_ssh_to_job_sshd_config_template under /usr/lib It's a bit weird to put these files in /etc, particularly linux_kernel_tuning. Package managers treat files under /etc specially and will consider the package to be installed even if these files are modified or deleted.

I (believe) it would be more normal to have these files under /usr/share and linked to from /etc.

https://www.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/ch-opersys.html https://www.debian.org/doc/manuals/maint-guide/dother.en.html#conffiles
